## Variables for `spotify` data.frame

The following are the variables present in the `spotify` data.frame.

-'pid'
-'playlist_name'
-'pos'
-'artist_name'
-'track_name'
-'duration_ms'
-'album_name'


## Figure 1

Provide both (1) ggplot code and (2) a simple comment to describe how 'playlist_name' varies by 'duration_ms'.

```{r}
library(ggplot2)

ggplot(spotify, aes(x = playlist_name, y = duration_ms, fill = playlist_name)) +
  geom_bar(stat = "identity") +
  theme(axis.text.x = element_text(angle = 45, hjust = 1)) +
  labs(title = "Playlist Duration Variation",
       x = "Playlist Name",
       y = "Duration (ms)",
       fill = "Playlist Name") 
```
